entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Parse/format `Half`s from/to UTF-8. #75313
  • Calling GetControllingUnknown () generates an assert #75312
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests crash on OSX Mono #75307
  • `[System.Console]::ReadKey()` returns escape sequence characters when pressing arrow keys in PowerShell on Linux #75305
  • System.Tests.AppDomainTests.MonitoringIsEnabled - Assert.InRange - on NativeAOT arm64 #75302
  • All build legs need to move off macOS 10.15 #75292
    7.0.0
  • Packages inside source build intermediate packages have improper nupkg branding #75290
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 and .NET 7-preview.7 comparing to .NET 5 when TERM is set to rxvt #75289
  • BinaryFormatterTests.SerializeHugeObjectGraphs hangs on ppc64le #75281
    Future
  • Move Linker repo to Runtime repo #75278
    8.0.0
  • UseWindowsService should support some method to invoke ServiceBase.RequestAdditionalTime #75276
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById() is case-sensitive on Linux #75275
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerClosesOutboundControlStream_ClientClosesConnection - Status code: Unknown (0xdde6f334) #75270
  • .NET 7 Preview 7 - Polymorphic Deserialization ignores PropertyNameCaseInsensitive setting #75269
  • [wasm] All wasm jobs failing on perf pipeline with `.withExitOnUnhandledError is not a function` #75268
  • Android app size regression in .NET 7 RC 1 #75267
  • [wasm-mt] Emscripten SDK runtime pack is missing multi-threaded static libraries #75263
    7.0.0
  • Update msquic to 2.1.1 #75262
    7.0.0
  • Blazor wasm dynamic linking native sidemodules #75257
    8.0.0
  • HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsDevelopment() etc. seem more strict than necessary #75256
  • JIT: Expand delegate calls early #75255
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Recheck CSE defs in hot blocks for uses in cold blocks on non-xarch #75253
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on win-x86 #75249
    7.0.0
  • Crash with unmanged DLL did not create a StackTrace in Eventlog #75245
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\DictionaryExpansion\\DictionaryExpansion\\DictionaryExpansion.cmd #75244
  • [User Story] CI Health: Redefining CI investigations and Health #75243
    8.0.0
  • MEF2: Cannot get the same instance with ```SharedAttribute```. #75236
    Future
  • Test failure System.Xml.Tests.SubtreeReaderTest.RunTests(testCase: 105376: ReadBase64 runs into an Overflow) #75231
  • JIT: perf regression from improved local struct copy prop #75229
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Add method String.TrimAll() to remove all whitespaces from a string #41822
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add range check for "Math.Clamp" #42757
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection is the best library ever! #75310
    Future
  • Math.Min<T> Max<T> Clamp<T> #43796
    Future
  • Expose SafeHandle method for flipping handle / file descriptor inheritability #46832
    Future
  • The Generic Enum.Parse<T> method should have a Generic Type Constraint on Enum #48310
    Future
  • Support Uniform Device API #48898
    Future
  • NonBacktracking treats timeout check boundaries as end-of-input for anchors #74467
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Add an Activator.CreateInstances function for creating class instances from a collection of Types. #51465
    Future
  • AppContext.UnSetSwitch(string switchName) #51710
    Future
  • [Suggestion] ROS.Slice with auto-end-check like BinaryReader ? #52188
    Future
  • .NET Core System.Math type has no overloaded support for Exp(decimal) #55113
    Future
  • .NET Core System.Math type has no overloaded support for Log(decimal) #55114
    Future
  • .NET Core System.Math type has no overloaded support for TanH(decimal) #55115
    Future
  • Add short and URL friendly string representation to `System.Guid` #55290
    Future
  • JIT: OSR stress tests hitting post-phase asserts #74876
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net.Security #73851
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Abort on cancellation throws QUIC_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER #73688
    7.0.0
  • Wrong DIM for `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75059
    7.0.0
  • What is the intended way to ship System.Memory.dll for use in a .NET Framework app? #75280
  • [Docs] When can `AssemblyName.Version` be null #75228
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests fail #74408
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests fail #74407
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.RW.XmlSystemPathResolver.Tests fail #74406
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress test failures for GET Aborted scenario #72619
    7.0.0
  • ExportPem_ExportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKeyPem fails with 0 iteration count #75234
  • [dotnet-runtime-perf][wasm] `Perf_File.CopyToOverwrite` benchmark failing with `System.IO.IOException: File exists` #74104
    8.0.0
  • Bad Process.StartTime in .NET 6 on Android #67583
    8.0.0
  • Grpc.Net.Common .NETStandard is missing "Grpc.Net.Compression.DeflateCompressionProvider" #75086
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170.sh #74260
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failure when AOT'ed with SIMD support - `JSException : TypeError: globalThis.WebSocket is not a constructor` #75098
  • CI failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler tests #75164
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] SIGABRT in stress tests #72696
    7.0.0
  • ParallelLoopState.ShouldExitCurrentIteration does not match true later than true is assigned #73607
    Future
  • JIT: GC\API\GC\GetTotalPauseDuration failing in experimental pipeline #74877
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • disable gcmemoryinfo on win-arm64 #75309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #75308
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable MonitoringIsEnabled with issue 75302 #75306
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: run local assertion prop before morphing return of local struct … #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove enumerator allocation when constructing RestrictedAsciiStringEncoding #75303
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Simplify AsnDecoder.ReverseBitsPerByte #75301
    area-System.Security
  • remove Centos 8 from Helix as it is EOL #75299
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix GCEvent::Wait with timeout on OSX #75298
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Additional build fixes #75297
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #75295
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump the macOS image to one that isn't EOL yet #75294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • update Debian Helix images to msquic 2.1.1 #75291
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • update msquic to 2.1.1 #75287
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Perf] Update shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App path from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0 path for main runs. #75285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [release/7.0] Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75284
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove Browser implementation of PBKDF2 one-shot. #75283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Fix test issues on armv6, s390x, ppc64le on runtime-community #75282
  • [wasm] add git hash to dotnet.js and print it from unit tests #75279
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use PopCount instead of loop for X.509 chain status #75277
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75271
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Initial osx-arm64 bring up #75264
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #75261
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify windows version detection in vm #75254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump to latest objwriter package #75247
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75246
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid array out of bound access for commit accounting #75232
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [mono][wasm] Fix boxing of gsharedvt nullables. #75288
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Linux-Bionic] Skip NamedPipeTest_UnixDomainSocket tests and move LB pipeline to runtime-extra-platforms #75273
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Drop actually not exported types from dotnet.d.ts #75265
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Drop 6.0.200 workload manifests #74595
    area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • move ref DirectoryEntryConverter to System.DirectoryServices.Design namespace #75235
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Comment fix: WebProxy volatile field comment fix #75300
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: local assertion prop and redundant zeroing #74967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix OSR post-phase assert #75227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Linux/arm and Linux/arm64 JIT rolling builds #75209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable WBT completely due to #75233, till a fix lands #75274
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Disable System.Net.Requests.Tests on Mono Linux arm64 #75266
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Update namespace of JsonPolymorphismOptionsTests #75205
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior and support namespaces/generics in release #75260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #75179
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add CI job for AOT+SIMD to `runtime-wasm` for PRs #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75063
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #75163
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Update Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 cross containers to ones including pip3 #75167
  • [wasm-mt] Fix failing System.Xml tests on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75124
    area-System.Xml
  • [release/7.0][wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0][ppc64le] Fixed thunk address 8 byte alignment issue #75258
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [ppc64le] Bug fixes #75259
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix tests to use valid PBE iterations #75240
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Fix tests to use valid PBE iterations #75238
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Drop actually not exported types from dotnet.d.ts #75252
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Floor and Ceiling intrinsics for amd64 #74936
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #75192
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix NodeJS build #75187
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75193
    area-System.Net
  • [Android] Avoid using OffsetDateTime on APIs 25 and lower #75196
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • [AArch64] amend the disassembly comment for the instruction. #75241
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify installer build by using step container targets #75011
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Exclude segment_standby_list from regions #74975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unreferenced cryptographic files #75216
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Tar: Fix buffer is too small error when writing Prefix on large filenames #75023
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • Reuse more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration code in JS generators #74949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

    area-Debugger-mono

    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action

    area-GC-coreclr

  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

  • Initialization failures logging #75097

    area-System.Net.Http
